__e: I mean, here I am, solo at the wedding of the girl I spent half my life assuming I'd marry, and why?
Well, what would you call it when one person asks another person to marry him and she says "yes"
But I knew I could marry Carlos and still do exactly as I please.
Well, I want to marry her, but you got to start somewhere, right?
Anyway, I'm not asking you to marry the guy, just go out with him.
He even asked her to marry him, but she said no.
